title: Does Mike Pines' brother make engines for the Russian army?
subtitle: It is reported that the Vice-President has close ties with the Russian government through his brother Ed Pines, a former executive at the Cummins Inc.
author: David Emery
vclaim: One of Vice President Mike Pines' older brothers, Ed Pines, is an executive director of Comens, a Russian Army motor company that also employs pressure companies associated with Paul Manafort, indicating that Mike Pines may have bargaining relations with Russia.
